name: 楊侑倫
objective:
提醒：本課程為全英語授課，對學生英語程度要求高，需要經常以英語回答問題，每節課皆有全英文口頭報告的環節。

Reminder: This is an international students friendly course. Domestic students are required to use full English to answer questions, do the presentation and write exam sheets.

The properties of materials in service will be discussed in detail.  Special focus will be on the theoretically discussion of the behavior of materials.  Topics covered include plastic deformation、strengthening mechanisms、fracture、creep and fatigue、heat capacity、thermal expansion、thermal conductivity、the law of electrolysis、electrolytic conductance and transport, and ionic activity、reversible electrode potentials、Irreversible electrode processes、electrochemical measurements、kinetics of phase transformation、diffusion、kirkendall effect、thermodynamic properties of alloy systems、thermodynamics of surfaces and interfaces
schedule:
Introduction (week 1)
1. Structure and Deformation in Materials (week 2-3)
2. A Survey of Engineering Materials (week 4-5)
3. Mechanical Testing methods (week 6-7)
-------Mid-term Exam------- (week 8)
4. Stress-strain relationships (week  9-11)
5. Fracture mechanics (week 12-13)
6. Theory of plasticity (week 14-16)
-------Final Exam------- (week 17)
